name: mlx-openai-server
summary: A high-performance API server that provides OpenAI-compatible endpoints for MLX models. Built with Python and FastAPI, it enables efficient, scalable, and user-friendly local deployment of MLX-based multimodal models with an OpenAI-compatible interface. Supports text, vision, and audio processing capabilities. Perfect for developers looking to run MLX models locally while maintaining compatibility with existing OpenAI-based applications.
author: Huy Vuong
